Hi, Iâ€™m Mel. I design and then build tools and/or strategies that help organizations reach new audiences or think about audiences in different ways.

I currently work on lots of different projects at 18F, a digital design and technology agency within the U.S. government. I also write a weekly column for the Poynter Institute and lead Media Public, a public media startup that's funded through a Knight Prototype Grant.

Outside of work, I spend a lot of time hiking, exploring small towns in North Carolina, and hanging out with A and our dog Sadie.
